tweet_text: @BonnieDewolfe @Denali_Beth @ErikaIsBoredMan @prettyalright Always lawyer up if the police are going to be talking to you. Their job is to find *a* story that works, it doesn’t matter if it’s the truth. It doesn‘t matter if you are innocent if it’s the easiest story to sell a jury.
